delete.description:
Delete a device. This also removes all resources in the device on cloud side.
example: /oic/account?di=9cfbeb8e-5a1e-4d1c-9d01-00c04fd430c8&accesstoken=0f3d9f7fe5491d54077d

202.description: 2.02 Deleted response informing the device is successfully deleted.

authprovider.description: The name of Authorization Provider through which Access Token was obtained

accesstoken.description: Access-Token used for communication with OCF Cloud after account creation

di.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.

expiresin.description: Access-Token remaining life time in seconds (-1 if permanent)

refreshtoken.description: Refresh token can be used to refresh the Access Token before getting expired

redirecturi.description: Using this URI, the Client needs to reconnect to a redirected OCF Cloud. If provided, this value shall be used by the Device instead of Mediator-provided URI during the Device Registration.

accesstoken.description: Access-Token used for communication with cloud after account creation

uid.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.
